Strategy.Description:
Yellow Palace Strategy

A Countertrend system that buys when Relative Strength becomes oversold, but it doesnâ€™t buy until the string and momentum turns up and becomes above a certain level (price raise). 

Things notice:

- Only one long position can be places.

- Each stock needs its own preferred parameters.

- Sell only when RIS crosses over bought and momentum percent becomes below zero (ROC).

- There is adjustable stop lose parameter. The position will be sold on lose if it goes below it.

- The parameters are RSI (period, oversold, overbought), ROC period, stop lose, and Price rise.

- The system assumes an overall trend (bullish or breach). If the trend is breach then short positions can be initiated.

- At the start of the period you can enter into a position immediately or wait until the stock moves into oversold.
